## Trove.apply() method

Make a new Trove by applying a [TroveChange](./lib-base.trovechange.md) to this Trove.

**Signature:**

```typescript
apply(change: TroveChange<Decimal> | undefined, borrowingRate?: Decimalish): Trove;
```
